## MetaManager search searchNode

Find any file/directory in the saved tree using regex

### Synopsis

Find any file/directory in the saved tree using regex. This prints the found nodes
in a tree fashion.

```
MetaManager search searchNode [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for searchNode
```

